author: {'steamid': '76561198073498868', 'num_games_owned': 1714, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 10905, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1955, 'last_played': 1708575667}
review: Turnbased wonder of a strategy mix/RPG game ! In my opinion, the best of the Kings Bounty series :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197999015580', 'num_games_owned': 687, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 3324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1659, 'last_played': 1377773666}
review: Man, this game is as addictive and as fun as it was back in 2009... Awesome design, best GUI, incredibly addictive combats and an impressively balanced difficulty. I mean, seriously, you gotta check it out. One of my favorite games EVAR!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561197964232046', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 20950, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19677, 'last_played': 1418218071}
review: Crossworlds/Armored Princess (same game, Crossworlds adds 5% new content this is mostly OP and not well thought out) is even better than the original King's Bounty. Bigger, better, more of everything, better class skills, Paladin class isn't worthless anymore, the Dragon pet is adorable, the list goes on. Basically a near-perfect tactical combat strategy game, and don't forget: Impossible difficulty is the only true way to play any King's Bounty game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009392905', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 1278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1228, 'last_played': 1559082567}
review: I really enjoy the King's Bounty style of gameplay. It's a delicious blend of RPG and Strategy. It's also a constant struggle, as you try to conquer the map as efficiently as you can--while leveling up skills, equipping useful gear, acquiring magic and managing your choice of units. The gameplay and quests are repetitive to be sure, but it's still so darn addictive. To top it off, the game is also chock full of content, so much so that I'm not sure I'll ever complete it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019589654', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2362, 'last_played': 86400}
review: Turn based fights with strange magics and spells. Pretty awesome and I spent too many hours doing it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993293926', 'num_games_owned': 464, 'num_reviews': 216, 'playtime_forever': 1755, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1552, 'last_played': 1399458482}

author: {'steamid': '76561197992886766', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 1877, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1836, 'last_played': 1447128083}
review:
If you're gonna get one of the King's Bounty games then this is the one you want!

Awesome fusion of turn-based hexagon grid battles and RPG exploration, questing, level up, and choosing talents! 

The story isn't anything to write home about but there are many locations to see and explore - you can even sail around in a boat and eventually get a flying horse that'll REALLY speed up your trek across many islands and contenients!

There are literally 100+ different unit types to choose from, tons of gear to find and equip to suit your build, and TONS of spells! to find and inscribe into your spellbook! If you love Heroes of Might and Magic, Disciples and other games like those then this is a MUST HAVE!

author: {'steamid': '76561198020105990', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 4094, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4094, 'last_played': 1359964800}

review: The mini-campaigns were sort of fun. I never replaced AP with the additions, though.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971072907', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 2346, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2346, 'last_played': 1346310000}
review: This series has gotten more play than just about anything I own, and I always find myself going back to it. It's definitely a mastery based game, and once you get good enough it can get a little boring even on the highest difficulties...

author: {'steamid': '76561197971407947', 'num_games_owned': 663, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 10635, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10635, 'last_played': 1345705200}
review: Spent so much time on this great game. This game has taken all the best of games like Heroes of Might and Magic, and simply perfected it. This is only single player, but there is enough content to keep you busy for a long time. Can't wait for the expansion to be released soon!

author: {'steamid': '76561198038371721', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 8503, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8082, 'last_played': 1396238550}

author: {'steamid': '76561198023764766', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 3327, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2899, 'last_played': 1439694972}
review: This game came before Hereo's of Might & Magic, and these latest releases, KIng's Bounty The Legend, and the Stand Alone expansions Armored Princess + Crossworlds, reclaim the throne to rule as the best turn based fantasy game.  It's a perfect merge of Diablo-esque and Heroe's play, and strips out the tiresome map domination game play of Heroes, and focuses on the fun elements, such as the role-playing and the actual battles.  Don't let the the cheaper price fool you, this game is still a heavy hitter.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998827138', 'num_games_owned': 1209, 'num_reviews': 422, 'playtime_forever': 4387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3809, 'last_played': 1381582377}
review: King's Bounty: Armored Princess has vivid colorful graphics, tactical combat with simple mechanics but high variety, and a long and entertaining campaign. This expansion adds more variety in the form of new units and abilities, some extensions to the original campaign and two new, smaller, campaigns. Easily worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993438122', 'num_games_owned': 1167, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 13211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6430, 'last_played': 1705293430}
review:
Basically a large add-on to Armored Princess with a couple short campaigns thrown in. Overall a very enjoyable package and since it includes Armored Princess I would definitely recommend purchasing Crossworlds instead of Armored Princess. Of course I love this series and so I have purchased King's Bounty: The Legend here on Steam AND on Good Old Games (shout out to the great gog.com) AND Armored Princess AND Crossworlds. It is just a shame they don't have Crossworlds on gog.com b/c I would buy another copy.
If you love strategy games then buy this, you will love it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001533034', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 4608, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4608, 'last_played': 1333177200}
review: Similar to the Heroes of might and magic games.  No town building and single player only.  This campaign is better than the original King's Boundy game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974243998', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 133, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 86400}
review: This was a fun old school fantasy RPG game with turn based combat. It was a very addicting and "feel good" good experience. It'll bring back memories of playing marathons with the original final fantasy and similar games back on the regular and super nintendos. The graphics are good enough, but it's the charm which will win you over.

Crossworlds je datadisk pro Armored Princess a jedn√° se de facto o hru Armored Princess (stejn√° kampa≈à s p≈ô√≠bƒõhem) s nƒõkolika vylep≈°en√≠mi (nov√© questy, jednotky ork≈Ø s adrenalinem, nov√© mini kampanƒõ), tak≈æe je lep≈°√≠ koupit rovnou Crossworlds, proto≈æe to je prostƒõ vylep≈°en√° Armored Princess.

Za sebe m≈Ø≈æu KB:Crossworlds jedinƒõ doporuƒçit, je to velmi dob≈ôe udƒõlan√° tahovka s velmi dlouhou hrac√≠ dobou. Jedin√Ω ne≈°var bych snad vydƒõl jen v tom, ≈æe je to t√©mƒõ≈ô to sam√© (by≈• s mnoha a mnoha vylep≈°en√≠mi) jako p≈ôedchoz√≠ KB:Legends (kter√Ω pro pochopen√≠ p≈ô√≠behu hr√°t ani nemus√≠te), co≈æ na ≈°odu b√Ωt ani nemus√≠, pokud v√°s p≈Øvodn√≠ KB:Legends bavilo.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993327232', 'num_games_owned': 382, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 7268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7268, 'last_played': 1345618800}
review:
A spiritual sequel to the old King's Bounty game, these are massive strategy games with character progression and a good deal of customization. The game is pretty solidly balanced, and many different strategies will work. I got 85 hours out of King's Bounty: The Legend just going through the game once, and I have 93 hours in Armored Princess/Crossworlds. An important thing to note is that the Crossworlds expansion has an updated version of the Armored Princess campaign, so unless you want to play it twice you should probably do the Crossworlds version of it. I think both games in the series are worth playing.

Only play on Hard if you are prepared for an actual challenge, because King's Bounty does not fuck around. The Warrior class seems a little less viable on Hard than the others, but I still beat the game on Hard with a Warrior. You are likely to be required to change up your strategy at least partially depending on what resources you have at hand.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010577733', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 993, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 993, 'last_played': 1322035200}
review:
While I enjoyed the King's Bounty games, this 'expansion' is a little misleading.  First of all, there is no real new campaign, but rather an alteration of the existing Armoured Princess campaign to add in some new variables, which does NOT update an existing AP game, meaning the only way to see this new content is to start a new campaign, which is bullshit.

The other 'campaigns' can't really be called campaigns, but rather a couple of hours of gameplay (at most) additions that are 1 dimensional meh-fests.

Avoid this unless the price drops below $5, as anything more is a complete rip-off.  Even at $5, this still feels like you got taken.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044619825', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 6079, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6079, 'last_played': 1380312312}
review: Just as awesome as the King's Bounty games with a few extra features! A must for turn based strategy fans, and just gamers in general.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022232386', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1334559600}
review:
Where once there was Homm, now there is KB:C.
Real time exploration grants fast "no wait" gameplay and trun based battle lets you enjoy the tactical combat we all loved in Homm.

I did miss the building and rescource management part of game a bit but didnt notice it on my first playthrough :)

All in all this has been one of the best gaming experiences in long while.
9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197994130089', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2581, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2581, 'last_played': 1344841200}
review: If you enjoyed playing stuff like Heroes of Might and Magic, then the King's Bounty games are for you.    Has a good story, that keeps moving along as well as several hours of side quests you are able to do also.  Seriously, the best $2.50 i have spent in a long time.  Think it is around $10-$15 now because the sale is over, but i would of been just as happy paying $15 for it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032339954', 'num_games_owned': 524, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 5614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5614, 'last_played': 1307430000}
review:
Crossworlds ek paketi aslƒ±nda Armored Princess‚Äôin ek paketi oluyor.Ana senaryoya birtakƒ±m yeni birimler,g√∂revler ve itemlar ekliyor.Ayrƒ±ca 2 yeni campaing mevcut.Eƒüer Cs elinizde varsa Orc senaryosundan ba≈ülamanƒ±zƒ± √∂neririm.
 
 ƒ∞lk oyunda kurtardƒ±ƒüƒ±mƒ±z k√º√ß√ºk prensesimiz b√ºy√ºm√º≈ü ve d√ºnyasƒ±nƒ± savunmak i√ßin kƒ±lƒ±√ß ku≈üanmƒ±≈ütƒ±r.Tehdit o kadar b√ºy√ºkt√ºr ki kendini ba≈üka d√ºnyalardan medet ummak zorunda kalƒ±r.ƒ∞lk oyunu bitirenler hala Endoria d√ºnyasƒ±yla ilgili bir ≈üeyler beklemiyorlardƒ± deƒüil mi? √á√ºnk√º ger√ßekten yapacak bir ≈üey kalmamƒ±≈ütƒ± ve bunu bilen yapƒ±mcƒ± firma bizi bu sefer Teana gezegenine atƒ±yor.Teana, Endoria ile hemen hemen aynƒ± bir d√ºnya.Harita olarak adalara ayrƒ±lmƒ±≈ü durumda.Bu biraz sƒ±ksa da zamanla a≈üƒ±lƒ±yorsunuz.Ama ben yine de b√ºy√ºk Endoria topraklarƒ±nƒ± daha √ßok sevmi≈ütim.Teana da elbette b√ºy√ºk bir gezegen ama topraklar genelde ufak adalardan olu≈ütuƒüundan yer darlƒ±ƒüƒ± √ßekiyormu≈üsunuz gibi geldi.

 √ñncelikle diyaloglarda bir eksiklik olduƒüunu ve g√∂revlerin eskisi gibi ihti≈üamlƒ± anlatƒ±lmadƒ±ƒüƒ±nƒ± fark edeceksiniz.ƒ∞lk oyunun en iyi yanlarƒ±ndan biri muhte≈üem diyaloglardƒ±.Crossworlds de diyaloglar biraz ba≈ütan savma gibi olmu≈ü.G√∂revlerde aynƒ± paralelde gittiƒüi i√ßin eskisi gibi zevk alamayacaksƒ±nƒ±z.Yeni eklenen birimler dengeyi bozmamƒ±≈ü.Birimlerin 2 hatta 3. c√ºl yetenekleri sayesinde taktik ve strateji ciddi bir ≈üekilde deƒüi≈ümi≈ü.Oyunun en g√ºzel yanlarƒ±ndan biride bu.Birimlerinizin yeni yetenekleri sava≈üƒ±n gidi≈üatƒ±nƒ± deƒüi≈ütirebiliyor.Sava≈ü demi≈üken ben hard da oynadƒ±ƒüƒ±m i√ßin belli bir yere kadar epey zorlandƒ±m.√á√ºnk√º artƒ±k lvl atladƒ±k√ßa sadece liderlik puanƒ±nƒ±z artƒ±yor.Artƒ±k saldƒ±rƒ± veya defans puanlarƒ± artmadƒ±ƒüƒ± i√ßin ba≈ülarda epey zorluk √ßekiyorsunuz.Bunlarƒ± ancak yetenek aƒüacƒ±ndan veya ortalƒ±kta √ßok az bulunan yerlerde arttƒ±rabiliyorsunuz.ƒ∞lk 15 saat inanƒ±lmaz zorluk √ßektim bu y√ºzden.Sonrasƒ±nda ise zorluk bƒ±√ßakla √∂yle bir kesildi ki neredeyse b√ºt√ºn sava≈ülarƒ± kayƒ±p vermeden kazandƒ±m.Olay bu duruma gelince de sƒ±kƒ±lmamak m√ºmk√ºn deƒüil.Kƒ±saca oyunun dengesini hi√ß ayarlayamamƒ±≈ülar.E buda belli bir zamandan sonra anlamsƒ±zca ko≈üturacaƒüƒ±nƒ±z anlamƒ±na geliyor.Bu a√ßƒ±klarƒ± kapamak i√ßin oyuna ba≈üarƒ± sistemi koymu≈ülar(achievement).Mesela 50 sava≈üƒ± kayƒ±psƒ±z atlatƒ±rsanƒ±z 1000 liderlik puanƒ± alƒ±yorsunuz.Bu gibi √∂zellikler oyuna renk katmƒ±≈ü.

 King‚Äôs Bounty d√ºnyasƒ±nƒ±n en √∂nemli √∂zelliƒüi birimlerim ve itemlerƒ±n rastgele √ßƒ±kmasƒ±dƒ±r.Ama ≈üansƒ±nƒ±z yaver gitmese ya oyun √ßok zor kalƒ±yor ya da √ßok kolayla≈üƒ±yor.ƒ∞lk oyunda b√∂yle deƒüildi.Denge neredeyse hi√ß bozulmamƒ±≈ütƒ±.Ama Crossworlds de maalesef denge diye bir ≈üey kalmamƒ±≈ü.Bu rastgele birim olayƒ±nƒ± birazda olsa birimlerinizi upgrade etme √∂zelliƒüi sayesinde hafiflemi≈ü.≈û√∂yle ki 6 guardsmen‚Äôƒ± 1 knight a √ßevirebiliyorsunuz artƒ±k.B√ºt√ºn b√ºy√ºk kƒ±talarda bir tane upgrade yeri mevcut.B√∂ylece birim sƒ±kƒ±ntƒ±sƒ± pek √ßekmiyorsunuz.Item olayƒ±da rastgele olduƒüu i√ßin set itemlerƒ± tamamlamak imkansƒ±z bir hal alƒ±yor.Bo≈üuna kasmamanƒ±zƒ± √∂neririm.Birde oyunun bazƒ± b√∂lgeleri hatalƒ± tasarlanmƒ±≈ü olacak ki masa√ºst√ºne atƒ±yor.Autosave bir√ßok ≈üeyi kurtarsada Montero madenlerinde dola≈üƒ±rken her sava≈ütan sonra save etmenizde yarar var.

 Belki de yaptƒ±ƒüƒ±m en kƒ±sa inceleme bu oluyor ama okumak ve anlamak i√ßin bu kadarƒ± yeter kanƒ±mca.King‚Äôs Bounty Collection, Steam de 6 dolara bile d√º≈üt√ºƒü√º oluyor.Eƒüer alacaksƒ±nƒ±z ordan almanƒ±zƒ± √∂neririm.Benim toplam 100 saatim gitmi≈ütir oyuna.Epey vaktinizi alacaƒüƒ± kesin.ƒ∞lk oyunu oynayanlar hayal kƒ±rƒ±klƒ±ƒüƒ± ya≈üasa da bu oyuna bence ≈üans vermeliler.Ama normal de oynamanƒ±z tavsiyemdir.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998998498', 'num_games_owned': 591, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 4545, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4545, 'last_played': 1328256000}
review:
If you have ever been a fan of turn-based strategy games with RPG elements you should try this game. And if you're not a fan, after trying it you just might become one :P

The game has surpisingly good graphics, a colorful and detailed artstyle, deep and engaging gameplay, a quirky and humorous story and hours upon hours of fun.
This is a very long game with lots of replayability.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967992446', 'num_games_owned': 1178, 'num_reviews': 543, 'playtime_forever': 3348, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3348, 'last_played': 1361347200}
review: I don't know why it took me so long to get around to playing this. This is because the original King's Bounty was such a fascinating strategy sperger timesink that was pretty decent. However, if you HAVE to get one King's Bounty game, I wholly recommend Crossworlds, as it includes a much improved version of Armored Princess (the unofficial, much improved sequel) as well as several smaller campaigns that don't eat up much of your time but I assume are just as good. These are difficult games, but not on the level of Fate of the World or Bit.Trip Runner. Also you can send in an entire army of spiders to eat humans alive, I guess.

review: If you have an addictive personality and want to be a paladin with an army of undead, then this is the game for you! One can not simply comprehend how addicting this game is, with each battle and unit lost or gained, what you are capable of doing in-game shifts. Press your luck in highly hostile areas for amazing rewards, or derp around in weak zones building the perfect army, it's all up to you.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970327632', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 3014, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3014, 'last_played': 86400}
review:
Crossworlds is an expansion for King's Bounty: Armored Princess. What Crossworlds does is basically to take the same campaign from the main program and adds all kinds of new troups, enemies (it also introduces new mini-campaigns that I haven't tried yet)... I never played the original campaign of Armored Princess, therefore I started with Crossworlds right away, because I wouldn't play the basically same campaign twice in such short intervals. 
The game itself is of a turn based strategy type during fights and real-time when simply moving through the game world. Said environment consists of several diverse islands (inhabited by pirates, orcs, barbarians, dwarfs...). All islands are filled with secrets, treasures, characters, quests, shops, enemies... Islands become available, once certain navigation charts were found. They are then accessible by boat. 
The story itself is rather genre-typical, but not bad at all, especially to fantasy fans. It also doesn't take itself too serious.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991657927', 'num_games_owned': 1410, 'num_reviews': 440, 'playtime_forever': 10552, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10552, 'last_played': 86400}
